fullplot: A group of five mountaineers are hiking and climbing in the Scottish Highlands when they discover a young Serbian girl buried in a small chamber in the wilderness. They become caught up in a terrifying game of cat and mouse with the kidnappers as they try to get the girl to safety.
plot: A group of mountaineers in the Scottish Highlands discover a kidnapped girl and are pursued by her captors.
title: A Lonely Place to Die
